result.execSummary:
The defendant Bruce J. Spahr was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Theft-Movable Property <=$2500 [Modifiers: Repeater], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

superMiscConds.notes: Maintain fulltime school, work, or combination of at least 30 hours per week. Or if not, then perform 10 hours community service per week.

Counseling, treatment, and assessment as deemed appropriate by agent.
DNA sample w/ surcharge.

records.addlTxt:
Clerk Marisa.
Case Called: 9:52 am 
INCLUDES 14CF984 AND 15CF834. 
State appears by ADA Chris Plaunt; Deft appears by phone, pro se. 
Date and time set for hearing on petition for sentence adjustment. 
COURT questions deft re: petition in 14CF984 - notes time was already served in 15CF834 and sentence adjustment is on Ct. 1 only in 14CF984. 
State opposes sentence modification. 
COURT makes findings. 
COURT gives ruling - grants petition for sentence adjustment - dept has 30 days to develop plan for release. 
Adj: 9:58 am
to Court from Defendant 12/4/17 re: sentence adjustment not needed
to Defendant from BR 1, Judicial Assistant re: Verfication needed

INCLUDES 14CF984 AND 15CF834. 
State appears by ADA Mike Puerner and ADA Ralph Uttke; Deft appears by phone, pro se. 
Date and time set for hearing to correct JOCs. 
COURT notes letter from DOC re: correcting JOCs. 
No objections from the State 
COURT ORDERS JOC amended in 14CF984 on Ct. 1 to reflect 8 years imprisonment - 3 years IC and 5 years ES. 
COURT ORDERS JOC amended in 15CF834 on Ct. 1 to reflect 2 years imprisonment - 1 year IC and 1 year ES - JOC incorrectly stated "State Prison w/ Ext. Supervision 2YR." rather than "1YR."

ADDRESS INFO for Bruce J. Spahr

to Judge Jacobson from DOC - includes 14CF984 & 15CF834

Clerk Charli/Marisa
Case Called: 1:36 p.m.
INCLUDES: 14CF984, 15CF834
State appears by ADA Chad Minder.  Def appears in person with Atty Paul Goetz.  

DATE and TIME set for SENTENCING AFTER REVOCATION 14CF984:
Parties do not have an agreement as to sentence;
Parties make sentence arguments.


DATE and TIME set for PLEA/SENTENCING HEARING 15CF834:
Plea Quest/ Waiver of Rights filed. VRCW.

State moves to  AMEND 15CF834 to:
CT 1.  (Misd. Theft  943.20(1)(a) Repeater);
COURT grants above.

PLEA 15CF834:
CT 1. (Misd. Theft 943.20(1)(a) Repeater)>> Guilty

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis, & def guilty. 


COURT ORDERS: EACH COUNT to run concurrent
In 15CF834- 2 years prison (1 year IC & 1 year ES); 176 days credit; CONDITONS of ES: Counseling/Treatment/Assessment as deemed appropriate by agent; Maintain fulltime school/work/or combination of at least 30 hours per week, if not, 10 hours of CS per week; Eligible for CIP program; DNA Sample & Surcharge; CC.

In 14CF984- 
CT 1: 9 years Prison (3 years IC & 6 years ES); 290 days jail credit; CONDITONS of ES: Counseling/Treatment/Assessment as deemed appropriate by agent; Maintain fulltime school/work/or combination of at least 30 hours per week, if not, 10 hours of CS per week; Eligible for CIP program; DNA Sample & Surcharge; CC; Restitution in amount of $3869.28 (Payment of restitution- to be paid out of up to 25% of prison wages).
CT 3: 5 years Prison (2 years IC & 3 year ES); 290 days jail credit; CONDITONS of ES: Counseling/Treatment/Assessment as deemed appropriate by agent; Maintain fulltime school/work/or combination of at least 30 hours per week, if not, 10 hours of CS per week; Eligible for CIP program; DNA Sample & Surcharge; CC; Restitution in amount of $3869.28 (Payment of restitution- to be paid out of up to 25% of prison wages).

Adj: 2:04 p.m.

No contact with victim(s): P.S. and S.S. or their property.  Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.
